gid.description: Unique identifier for the team membership

resource_type.description: Type of the resource, such as team_membership

is_guest.description: Indicates if the user is a guest member of the team

team.description: The information associated with the team of the team membership

resource_type.description: Type of the resource, such as team

user.description: The details related to the user who is a member of the team

resource_type.description: Type of the resource, such as user
